page.title: 15THE SUPERNATURAL
page.content: In this area there are three major sources of psyco-kinetic powers. One of these is [redacted] in [redacted]. It is the oldest building in [redacted] and is also the only [redacted] building in the area. The supernatural occurances in this building involve the ghost of a man who committed suicide by hanging himself, after an arguement with a friend. He is said mainly to haunt the room which he died in but has also been seen in other parts of the building especially the kitchen. Many tennants or lodgers claimed to have seen him and have soon left the building. He does not restrict his haunting to only [redacted] because he has been seen in adjacent houses.
